Name: Vulcan Wisdom
Desciption: bonus to any vulcan in the current fight: +2

Name: GO UP A LEVEL
Desciption: go up a level ONLY after combat (doesnt have to be your combat)

Name: r2d2
Desciption: teamed with you in your battles and can carry an item

Name: scottie
Desciption: teamed with you in your battles and can carry an item

Name: STEAL A LEVEL
Desciption: pick one player and steal a level from them. You go up one and they go down one

Name: PARADOX
Desciption: cancels any trap or curse. play at any time, useable only once

Name: PARADOX
Desciption: cancels any trap or curse. play at any time, useable only once

Name: REACH THROUGH TIME
Desciption: Go through the discards to find any card that you want and take that card and discard this one. Usable only once.

Name: ALIEN TREASURE STASH
Desciption: draw three more teasure cards immediately. They are face down if you drew this card face down; otherwise, they are face-up

Name: SPACE GORILLA GLUE
Desciption: Use when someone sucessfully escapes a combat for any reason. They must reroll their escape (even if it was automatic)

Name: CLONE
Desciption: Summons your exact duplicate who fights beside you. You double your total strength. You may use this when you are the only player in combat.

Name: Invisibility Ray
Desciption: Use when your run away roll fails. You escape automatically. Usable only worse

Name: Portal Collapse
Desciption: Allows automatic escape, for one or two players, from any fight

Name: Mind control
Desciption: No player with a level higher than yours may refuse your request for help in a fight, or even ask for a reward. You cannot gain the winning level through compelling someone to fight with you.

Name: Redirect
Desciption: Play durring any combat. Any player (of your choice) now fights the monster, may ask for help normally, and gets the treasure and levels if he/she wins the fight. The original player then resumes their turn and may loot the room.

Name: Mind wipe
Desciption: Discard all monsters in combat. No treasure is gained but the player may loot the room. Usable only once.

Name: Actual God
Desciption: you may encounter an actual god only on your turn. The god steps in and renders the battle finished as the monster is now a puff of smoke. Even if you had failed a run away , you may now take the monsters treasure but no level is gained. Usable only once.

Name: Trans-Modifier
Desciption: Use during any combat. Turns any one monster into anv Tauntaun, which runs away, leaving its treasure behind. Usable only once.

Name: Mind Trick
Desciption: Allows you to change the victim of a curse you receive. Usable only once
